data.text: @Atas20191 Our apologies for all the inconvenience and distress caused. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

@77luisalmeida Olá Luís,

poderia nos indicar, por mensagem privada, o seu código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico (047...), para que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.

@Atas20191 Hi! We deeply regret the situation and the delay of your flight. We inform you that NAV’s new air traffic management system is being implemented, which may impact some flights (arrivals and departures) at Lisbon Airport, with special incidence until 24 October.
@MaryJoJans Hi! We look forward to welcoming you on board soon. Thank you! 😉
@NickLinford Hello Nick, the original flight was canceled and we protected all 5 passengers on the next flight available, which is still today at 19h20. Can we help you with any other questions?

@Luithi16 Olá Luithi, pedimos que nos indique o número do bilhete eletrónico e/ou código ROR que gerou a emissão do voucher, bem como o e-mail associado ao pedido, por mensagem direta, para garantir a confidencialidade dos seus dados, para verificar. Agradecemos desde já a informação.
@filsongomes Hola Denilson, respondimos por mensaje directo. Gracias.
@riec_lucas Hello Lucas, can we help through this channel? Send us a direct message. We are available.

@SjoerdJBoersma Hello Sjoerd, we apologize for the delay on our reply.
We've been informed that forgotten items are delivered to customs after 1 month.(1/2)

urls.title: Wine Experience
urls.description: TAP offers the world the best of Portuguese winemaking.

data.text:
Branco, Tinto, Porto… Qual será a vossa escolha para este voo? 🍷
A nossa nova Carta de Vinhos disponível a bordo tem opções exclusivamente portuguesas para os mais diversos paladares. Venham apreciá-los acima das nuvens! Saibam mais em: https://t.co/G5uiUUZNCV. https://t.co/FccofhdhUp

data.text: @MelJLees Hello Melissa, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.

@susanamarquesd Hello Susana,
We are very sorry for this situation and apologize for any inconvenience caused by it.
If our assistance is still needed, please let us know.
Thank you

@FatimaRVicens Hola Fatima, pedimos disculpas por el retraso en contestar. 
Para que podamos verificar la situación, por favor indique su código de reserva o numero de billete electrónico por mensaje privado. Gracias.
@marcrech Olá Marcelo, para que possamos verificar a situação, por favor indique-nos o seu código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico por mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@CoolAssPuppy Hello,
We answered per DM.
@felipezani Por motivos de segurança e confidencialidade dos seus dados, solicitamos que efetue o envio dos mesmos através de mensagem privada. Obrigada (2/2)

@felipezani Olá Felipe,
Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta. Para que possamos corretamente encaminhar a sua questão, pedimos que nos indique os seus dados de contacto, bem como uma cópia do email recebido. (1/2)

@KeyannaDjalo Hello Keyanna,
To verify the situation, please confirm us the claim reference number and the e-mail address associated to it.
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.

@carolbitencoart Olá nacarolina,
De forma a verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o código da reserva ou número de bilhete (047-XXXXXXXXXX).   
Por razões de privacidade, sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada.   
Obrigado.

@nevespdenise Hello Dorami, 
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@peter83400 Hello bertrand, 
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.
@BlancaPlanet Hola Blanca, lamentamos inmenso el retraso en la respuesta de su reclamación. Nuevamente hemos reforzado y le pedimos por favor que aguarde. Gracias

@t67160350 Para que nos seja possível verificar a sua questão, solicitamos que nos indique o seu código de reserva. Por questões de segurança e protecção dos seus dados, solicitamos que efetue o envio através de mensagem privada. Obrigada (2/2)

@t67160350 Olá T,
Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta. Devido a uma grande afluência de mensagens recebidas, não nos é possível responder de forma mais célere. (1/2)

@luongjoe_ @RebeccaTweets_ Hello Joe,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding
@DimSumMama Hi Ida, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.

@MelJLees Hi Melissa, to verify the information, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.
@paulieok Nevertheless, due to a high demand, it is possible that it takes more time than we would like. We guarantee that yours will be processed as soon as possible. Thank you (2/2)

@paulieok Hello Paul,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. All claim processes are being analyzed at the moment. (1/2)

@starflyergold @JSS779 Hello,
We appreciate your comment and sharing of your experience onboard our flights. Regarding your private message, we kindle request that you please wait for our feedback, which will be sent as soon as possible. Thank you

@matizbetone Hello Mateusz,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding

@AlexG52655115 Hello AlexG,
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@Mtven_ta_ni_lla Para que nos sea posible verificar su cuestión, le rogamos que nos envié su código de reclamo. Por cuestión de seguridad, le rogamos que haga el envío por mensaje privado. Gracias (2/2)

@Mtven_ta_ni_lla Hola MTVentanilla,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar más pronto. (1/2)

@Andrea00678390 In order for us to be able to check about your question, we kindly request that you provide us with the booking reference. For security reasons and data protection, we advise you to send the details through a private message. Thank you (2/2)

data.text:
@Andrea00678390 Hello Andrea,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. (1/2)
@stajak We hope to see you again soon and provide you with a more positive experience. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

@stajak We apologize for this situation. Your feedback is important and will allow us to have some insight as to where we can improve with our services in the future and exceed our customer's needs and expectations.

@stajak Hi! We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused and that the service provided did not meet your expectations. We inform you that the implementation of a new air traffic management system is impacting some flights (departures and arrivals) at Lisbon Airport.

@tatchjaz Para que possamos manter a confidencialidade dos dados, aconselhamos o envio por mensagem privada. 
Obrigada. (2/2)
@Bri_Shields @EWRairport And at the airport, can you please tell us if you made a complaint there?
@marcnoruega Hello Mark, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@EvanioGomes Olá Evanio, informamos que estamos a verificar a situação. Assim que tivermos mais informações sobre o seu pedido de reembolso, entraremos em contacto. Entretanto, disponha se necessitar de ajuda adicional. Obrigado.

@majoracarter We had already replied via DM. We are sorry to have to reiterate our answer. The flight coupons sequence must be honoured and in the event passengers do not show up for any flight, the onward flights are cancelled. This situation is foreseen in the Transport Conditions (3.3.6.).

@oleach10 Hello Ollie, we apologize for the situation and all constraints caused. In case we can be of further assistance, please provide us, via private message, with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. Thank you.

@dudadlk Olá Duda, lamentamos o atraso na conclusão do seu processo. Verificámos que o mesmo está a ser analisado e que será contactada, via email, o mais brevemente possível. Disponha se necessitar de ajuda adicional. Obrigado.

@jackburgess10 Hello Jack, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We inform you that your file is being analysed. Therefore, we have reinforced it and assure you that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.
@juangbenot Mientras tanto, si necesita de algo más, por favor háganos saber. Seguimos a su disposición. Un saludo. (2/2)

urls.title: Best offers to fly more | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Explore the lower prices and find flights to more than 70 destinations. Take advantage of our special offers and book your trip with TAP Portugal.

data.text:
Thinking about the next get away? 🤔
What if we had the best prices for a destination with: ☀️🌊🏛🍽🎊?
From culture to loads of fun, Portugal fulfills all requirements for a dream vacation! Book your next trip now at https://t.co/ihLfQ4bDbQ. https://t.co/cBqqhRKd4G

data.text: @paul__weimann Hello Paul, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@pedro_letras Para verificar, Pedro, pedimos que nos indique, por favor, o número dos casos e o endereço de e-mail associado aos mesmos. Por motivos de confidencialidade, sugerimos o envio dos dados por DM.
Obrigado.
@CatarinaRivera Hello Catarina, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@fasimioni @azulinhasaereas Olá Fabiano, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@Chris51330717 Hello Chris, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@PaulHarvie9 Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you. (II/II)

@PaulHarvie9 Hello Paul, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We assure you that it is being analysed and that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Regarding your question, we apologize, but we are not able to predict when you will be contacted. (I/II)
@tulipaflor81 Olá Tulipa, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@Captain_sun_ Hello,
We answered per DM.

@callumcalle Hello Callum, we apologize for the late delivery of the luggage and all constraints caused. In order to verify the situation, we kindly request you to provide us, via private message, with the Property Irregularity Report (PIR). Thank you.
@J_Cakes09 Hello Jeffrey, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@nomadicfeels @HenryNoelJr Hello, how can we help you? For security reasons, we kindly request you to send us your question via private message. Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @dolo_alcon Hello Dolo, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@travelnut925 Hi Maria, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.
@dolo_alcon Hi Dolo, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.

@Bri_Shields @EWRairport Hi Brian, please accept our apologies for the situation informed and all the distress caused. Can you please tell us the lost luggage process number that you opened at the airport? We suggest the details through DM. Thank you
@starflyergold Hi, can you please tell us the lost luggage process number that you opened at the airport? We suggest the details through DM. Thank you
@diegojatem @IATA Hi Diego, can you please tell us the lost luggage process number that you opened at the airport? We suggest the details through DM. Thank you

data.text: @CraigSteinman4 Hi Craig, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.

@Priscil80361352 Hi Priscila, as we informed you before any further questions regarding this situation, please contact our Miles&GO program directly. They will be the best area to help regarding your miles. Thank you

@yu26440222 Hello Yu,

We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding
@Christi65885485 Hi! We have replied via DM. Thank you.
@VeronicaG_V Verónica, no puede utilizar voucher con el descuento Miles&GO. Puede intentar nuevamente sin el descuento?
@VeronicaG_V Verónica, ya hemos verificado sus imágenes, hemos preguntado si está utilizando descuento Miles&GO también y cuál es la moneda por favor.
